title: Personal Website In True Nerd Fashion

title: Website with Blog

title: Website with Animations
projectSummary: A personal website with the core purpose of being visually appealing and fun to scroll through.

projectSummary: An animation-filled storyline-type app built alongside a hackathon team of 4 members (with one coder: Anri).

title: First Basic Website
projectSummary: The first personal website with basic CSS and HTML.

title: Dating Application for Dogs (TinDog)
projectSummary: A single-page web application designed to learn about landing page layout and web-technologies.

projectSummary: Facial Recognition System built with ideas from FaceNet and DeepFake.

title: Bias Detector
projectSummary: A General Adversarial Network that detects biasses and maps them across axes for tuning the GAN.
